results.name: Expansion of (1+3*x)/(1+2*x).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000 (terms 0..200 from Vincenzo Librandi)
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2).
formula: G.f.: 1/U(0)  where U(k)=  1 - x*(k+4) + x*(k+3)/U(k+1); (continued fraction, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 11 2012
maple: a:=n->mul(-2, k=0..n): seq(a(n), n=-2..30); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 22 2008
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 11 2006
